title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 171.3 - Revocation of nondriver identification card
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 171.3 - Revocation of nondriver identification card

State Regulations
A nondriver identification card shall be revoked based upon
a finding of a violation of section
392
or
392-a
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Upon such finding, no new card shall be issued
until after one year from the date of such revocation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
171.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
